text: Soni ngasim’bulaga mundu jwaakanyisye Allah (kum’bulaga) ikaweje paligongo lyakwitichika (ni malamusi ga Dini), sano mundu jwaulajidwe mwalupuso, basi pamasile patum’bichile machili jwawinjila jwakwe (gakuusya mbusyo, kapena kupochela malipilo, kapena kululuka), ningasajonanga (jwawinjilajo) pa kuulaga, chisimu jwalakwe juwele jwakamuchisyidwa (ni malamusi ga Dini)
